thread.title: Ed Nalbandian Returns to Avaya as Services Leader

author: cnbc.com
title: Ed Nalbandian Returns to Avaya as Services Leader
text:
SANTA CLARA, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Avaya Holdings Corp. (NYSE: AVYA) has announced the appointment of Ed Nalbandian as president of Avaya Services. Nalbandian will drive a customer-centric strategy for growth across all of Avaya’s global services. He brings over 30 years of deep services expertise and a focus on building long-term relationships with customers and partners.
Nalbandian returns to Avaya where during his previous six-year stint, he led the company’s managed services business–which in turn became the foundation for the company’s private cloud services. He most recently served as CEO at SPS (Strategic Products and Services), an Avaya business partner recently acquired by ConvergeOne. Early in his career, he ran managed services at IBM and AT&T. He then served as CEO of AimNet Solutions, which was acquired by Cognizant Technologies.
“Ed’s return to Avaya sends a clear signal that we are investing in our services capabilities and view services as a growth lever. Ed brings the vision, understanding and energy that will drive this business forward and maximize the value we are providing to our global customer base through our services offerings.”
-Jim Chirico, Avaya president and chief executive officer
“I am proud to be back at Avaya, and ready to seize the opportunity ahead as we take our services business to the next level. I look forward to working with clients to effectively and efficiently apply our solutions, along with disruptive new technologies, to help simplify and solve complex challenges and build competitive advantage for them. ”
-Ed Nalbandian, Avaya Services president
About Avaya
Avaya is a global leader in digital communications software, services and devices for businesses of all sizes. Our open, intelligent and customizable solutions for contact centers and unified communications offer the flexibility of Cloud, on-premises and hybrid deployments. Avaya shapes intelligent connections and creates seamless communication experiences for our customers, and their customers. Our professional planning, support and management services teams help optimize solutions, for highly reliable and efficient deployments. Avaya Holdings Corp. is traded on the NYSE under the ticker AVYA. For more information, please visit www.avaya.com .
